entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain. High 24 except 19 near Lake Erie. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 24 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
